sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CSUSERPROGRAMLAYOUT ( USER_ID ,PROGRAM_ID ,GRID_ID COLUMN_POSITION ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #P_USER_ID# ,#P_PROGRAM_ID# ,#P_GRID_ID# #P_COLUMN_POSITION# ,#P_REG_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CSUSERPROGRAMLAYOUT SET COLUMN_POSITION = #P_COLUMN_POSITION# ,REG_USER_ID = #P_REG_USER_ID# ,REG_DATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# AND PROGRAM_ID = #P_PROGRAM_ID# AND GRID_ID = #P_GRID_ID#
sqlMap.insert: /* 비밀번호 변경 기록 */ INSERT INTO CSUSERPASSINFO ( JOB_SEQ ,USER_ID ,USER_PASS ,CLIENT_IP ,CLIENT_NAME ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DATETIME ) VALUES ( JOB_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#P_USER_ID# ,#P_USER_PWD# ,#P_CLIENT_IP# ,#P_CLIENT_NAME# ,#P_REG_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CSUSER SET DEFAULT_PW = #DEFAULT_PW# WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID#
sqlMap.insert: /* 로그인 기록 */ INSERT INTO CSUSERINFO ( USER_SEQ ,USER_ID ,CLIENT_NAME ,CLIENT_IP ,PROCESS_FLAG ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DATETIME ) VALUES ( USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#P_USER_ID# ,#P_CLIENT_NAME# ,#P_CLIENT_IP# ,#P_PROCESS_FLAG# ,#P_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CSUSER SET ENABLE = #P_USER_ENABLE# WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID#

UPDATE CSUSERSYSINFO SET LOGIN_LAST_DATETIME = LOGIN_FINAL_DATETIME /* 로그인한 지난일시는 현재 마지막일시로 수정 */ ,LOGIN_FINAL_DATETIME = SYSDATE /* 현재일시로 수정 */ ,REG_USER_ID = #P_REG_USER_ID# ,REG_DATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# AND CLIENT_IP = #P_CLIENT_IP#
UPDATE CSUSER SET USER_PWD = #P_USER_PWD# ,REG_USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# ,DEFAULT_PW = #P_DEFAULT_PW# ,REG_DATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CSUSERPROGRAMBOOKMARK WHERE USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# AND PROGRAM_ID = #P_PROGRAM_ID#
